column1: NGR is from 1950s record and is adjacent to the reservoir, in fact, mostly over it. Altitudes match. NGR could be +/- 200m

There are duplications between this gauge and one of the gauges at CAE LLWYD RES, most are coincidental, however, from1922 to 1925 23 of the 48 montHly readings are duplicated but there is no indication on either record as to which is the original record. Readings left in this record.
